testcase.name: Verify user can view the products and prices by navigating from the home page
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens the URL "https://aspiration.com/"...........................passed And User clicks at Spend and Save link......................................passed And User navigates to product page..........................................passed Then User see two card products - Aspiration and Aspiration Plus............passed And User clicks Get Aspiration..............................................passed Then A modal containing an input field for an email address to sign up appears.passed And User close the modal....................................................passed Then User clicks at Get Aspiration Plus.....................................passed And A modal with monthly and yearly plans appears...........................passed Then Verify that yearly radio option is $71.88 paid once yearly.............passed And Verify that monthly radio option is $7.99 paid monthly..................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
